title: SOLIS: Singlet Oxygen Luminescence Investigation System
description: A comprehensive PyQt6-based GUI application for analyzing singlet oxygen decay kinetics data from time-resolved near-infrared luminescence measurements. Supports homogeneous and heterogeneous analysis methods with Numba-accelerated computations.

creators.name: Bastos, Erick Leite
creators.affiliation: Instituto de Química, Universidade de São Paulo
